Name: Jose Collins
Ingredients: 15 ml Sugar syrup 'rich' (2 sugar to 1 water, 65.0°Brix)
Instructions: Select and pre-chill a Collins glass .
Prepare garnish of skewered orange slice wheel and Luxardo Maraschino Cherry (sail).
STRAIN into ice-filled glass whilst also pouring soda.
Garnish with skewered orange slice wheel and maraschino cherry (sail).
Review: The classic long balance of sweet and sour with tequila adding Mexican spirit.
History: See the history of the Collins cocktail on our Tom Collins page.
Nutrition: One serving of Jose Collins contains 184 calories
